q1: how many times did Spain win the world cup?
a1: Spain have won the World Cup once, in 2010.
q2: Does Spain often make the quarter-finals?
a2: Spain has reached the quarter finals 4 times. 1934, 1986, 1994 and 2002. Thats only 4 times out of 21 World Cups.
a3: Spain's coach is Luis Enrique, a former Barcelona coach.
a4: Spain is doing alright so I would say yes.
a5: Spain players are good in Leadership Skills
